summary: The article discusses the updates to the MkDocs AI Summary feature, introducing multiple AI services integration, adaptive environment configuration, intelligent caching system, and flexible options. It highlights features like multi-language summaries, automatic content cleaning, and robust caching. Technical aspects include unified API integration, error handling, and display optimizations. Planned features include multi-AI service support, secure API key management, and upcoming functionalities like batch processing and data export.
page_title: MkDocs AI 摘要更新日志
